picard.analysis

Class RrbsSummaryMetrics

  • java.lang.Object
    • htsjdk.samtools.metrics.MetricBase
      • picard.metrics.MultilevelMetrics
        • picard.analysis.RrbsSummaryMetrics

  • public final class RrbsSummaryMetrics
extends MultilevelMetrics
    Holds summary statistics from RRBS processing QC

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      java.lang.Integer CPG_BASES_CONVERTED
      Number of CpG sites that were converted (TG for +, CA for -)
      java.lang.Integer CPG_BASES_SEEN
      Number of CpG sites encountered
      java.lang.Double MEAN_CPG_COVERAGE
      Mean coverage of CpG sites
      java.lang.Integer MEDIAN_CPG_COVERAGE
      Median coverage of CpG sites
      java.lang.Integer NON_CPG_BASES
      Number of times a non-CpG cytosine was encountered
      java.lang.Integer NON_CPG_CONVERTED_BASES
      Number of times a non-CpG cytosine was converted (C->T for +, G->A for -)
      java.lang.Double PCT_CPG_BASES_CONVERTED
      CPG_BASES_CONVERTED / CPG_BASES_SEEN (fraction)
      java.lang.Double PCT_NON_CPG_BASES_CONVERTED
      NON_CPG_CONVERTED_BASES / NON_CPG_BASES (fraction)
      java.lang.Integer READS_ALIGNED
      Number of mapped reads processed
      java.lang.Integer READS_IGNORED_MISMATCHES
      Number of reads discarded for exceeding the mismatch threshold
      java.lang.Integer READS_IGNORED_SHORT
      Number of reads discarded due to being too short
      java.lang.Integer READS_WITH_NO_CPG
      Number of reads discarded for having no CpG sites
